lead_paragraph: Military intervention in Libya could lead to expanded American involvement in other countries in Africa.

headline.print_headline: Opening a New Front Against ISIS
headline.main: Opening a New Front Against ISIS in Libya

snippet: Military intervention in Libya could lead to expanded American involvement in other countries in Africa.
abstract: Editorial criticizes fact that Obama administration is considering opening third military front against Islamic State group in Libya without meaningful debate in Congress; underscores absurdity that campaign against group is predicated on 2001 law meant to target Al Qaeda; blames Congress for abdicating its duty to vote on matter.
